channel.title: Photos on modular.khiat
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on modular.khiat

item.title: vco.40106 ver_1.0
item.description: VC0.40106 鋸齒波核壓控振盪器 純模擬基礎波形vcO，1v/oct標準音高壓控 鋸齒波核心電路，三種波形各自獨立輸出 ﻿範圍豆大的指數頻率調製 (exp. fm) ﻿小體積 （4hp），給你以量取勝的可能 Designed by Sitao Yang also known as Khiat.

item.title: mix.3m.clip ver_1.0
item.description: mix.3m.clip 三通道發光二極管失真混音器 是不是總覺得mixer輸出的聲音還不夠大？ ﻿必備的單聲道混音器，附帶總線失真效果 ﻿﻿clip 模式：少見的利用雙極LED音頻限幅電路，燈越亮波形被削得越厲害！ ﻿﻿clean 模式：無音染，可作為直流信號混合器 ﻿背面含外部輸入輸出接口，通道數可無限擴展 Designed by Sitao Yang also known as Khiat.

item.title: p.att ver_1.0
item.description: p.att 三通道無源衰減器 全世界最好的盲板是電位器. ﻿必備：控制信號幅度、調節音量 ﻿拯救没有CV輸入量調節的其他模塊 ﻿具有信號複製功能 ﻿無需電源，比盲板好（謙虛） Designed by Sitao Yang also known as Khiat.

item.title: vco.40106-1 ver_0.1
item.description: The pizo_duo ver 0.1 is kool. Designed by Sitao Yang also known as Khiat.

item.title: 64hp_3u
item.description: The 64hp_3u ver 0.1 is kool. Designed by Yilong Xia also known as XIA.

item.title: piezo_duo
item.description: The pizo_duo ver 0.1 is kool. Designed by Sitao Yang also known as Khiat. Double preamp of piezo.
